thread.title: Mt. Hood Meadows rolls out summer season with scenic chairlift rides, concerts

author: senh
title: Mt. Hood Meadows rolls out summer season with scenic chairlift rides, concerts
text: BING NEWS: Mt. Hood Meadows rolls out summer season with scenic chairlift rides, concerts Mt. Hood Meadows, Portland's busiest ski area in winter, will expand its summer operational schedule started last year to 10 days this August, with its Stadium chairlift running for sightseeing rides on Saturdays and Sundays during the month.
